title: Iceland Has Its Own AI George Carlin Moment, Considers Law Against Deepfaking the Dead
description: The national broadcaster has started a nationwide controversy after it reanimated a beloved Icelandic comedian for its New Year's Eve celebration.

title: Inside a Global Phone Spy Tool Monitoring Billions
description: A wide-spanning investigation by 404 Media reveals more details about a secretive spy tool that can tracks billions of phone profiles through the advertising industry called Patternz. Google has taken action in response to 404 Media's inquiries.

title: Oklahoma Bill Would Rewrite Long-Accepted Obscenity Standards
description: A new bill introduced this month that aims to amend the Miller Test for obscenity is nonsensical and unconstitutional, experts say.
